citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:45pm on
October 15, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by arriving at the facility. The inspector spoke with a
family member who stated the licensee was away from the facility, not reachable by phone, and not expected back for
several hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:45pm on 
October 15, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by arriving at the facility. The inspector spoke with a 
family member who stated the licensee was away from the facility, not reachable by phone, and not expected back for 
several hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
